text: Bumbler Bee-Luxe is a multidirectional shooter video game developed and published by American studio Dadgum Games in 1997 for the Macintosh. ==Gameplay== Bumbler Bee-Luxe is a 2D shooter in which the player is a bee, trying to protect its hive from invaders. ==Reception== Next Generation reviewed the Macintosh version of the game, rating it four stars out of five, and stated that "The only downside is that the background never seems to change [...] and sometimes, due to the color scheme, we lost track of enemies against the honey-combed background. Overall though, an excellent effort." ==References== ==External links== *Bumbler Bee-Luxe at Incredibly Strange Games (2010) Category:1997 video games Category:Mac OS games Category:Mac OS- only games Category:Multidirectional shooters Category:Video games developed in the United States
